channel.title: Comments on: Celebrating three months of blogging

item.title: By: Six Months? | Victim to Charm

item.description: […] valuable to me because they show my progress. Here’s a roundup of all of them, inspired by a post by one of my Blogging 201 […]

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/celebrating-three-months-of-blogging/#comment-127">JT</a>.
Thank you! That's really useful to know. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JT.

Thank you! That’s really useful to know. :)

item.title: By: JT
item.dc:creator: JT
item.description: Congratulations on three great months and I hope there will be many more! (And although I liked the old summaries I think the new ones are better.) :)
item.content:encoded: Congratulations on three great months and I hope there will be many more! (And although I liked the old summaries I think the new ones are better.) :)
